attributes.action: Stop British women serving in front-line combat units.
attributes.additional_details:
Factors which contribute to this;

● Women naturaly weigh less and are weaker than men.
● More phycological stress will be put on men in the battle field.
●Training camps such as CTCRM Lympstone dont have female accomidation so money will have to be spent bulding it.
●Standards will eventualy slip to accomadate for the women.
●Other foreign militarys have tried this with little sucsess.
attributes.background: British women are now allowed to fight on the frontline and join units such as the Royal marines and the UKSF which evidently will result in the elite and special force's standards sliping and cost more of our soldiers lives putting our country in a vunrable state.
